column5: hey guys, myself and four others flew in to Thunder Bay from Hamilton to do some fishing. Decided to rent some ice huts from Sugar Shack rentals. Archie supplied us with four nice huts and treated us like gold for the weekend. thanks from all archie, will do again. met up with my Dad Gordy ,two brothers and uncle. We fished off coffin island, and all of us easily caught our limits and missed many more. fish were on for sure. my buddy Alex got a huge surprise when he pulled a 5 lb. whitefish out of 11 feet of water. Archie mentioned first he had ever seen from that area. congrats Alex. managed a few pike also. here are some pictures from this weekend , again thanks to my dad (Gord Monty) and sugar shack rentals for a great time. we were fishing Lac De Mille Lacs in ignace ontario       king  for the weekend  4lb.5oz walleye by my dad
Looks like a great time!!  Nice fish too!  Sinker
good report,looks like a great time
what a cool thing to do!  great report!  cheers!
Looked like a fun and rewarding outing Monty!
looks like a great time, thanks for sharing.
That looks like a great trip nice fish  rob
Wow, flew from Hamilton to Thunder Bay to ice fish? Go big or go home eh? LOL! Great pic's looks an awesome trip!
Looked like a great time, cool...
Looks like a good time you had with your buds and your Pops!!  ....were those ice bungalows you stayed in or just fishin huts??

Great fishing report & pics !!!!.  .well it sure was worth the trip to thunder bay,and it looks like everyone had fun & caught fish too.  ..very niced sized walleyes as well,thanks for sharing....cheers
Great report and looks like an awesome trip. Thanks for the pics and report.
they were huts with wood stove and tables that folded down we slept three  but who slept anyway    we were catching ling at night to

Sounds like a great way to spend time with the family and friends.  I was suppose to hit lac whenI was home for the holidays but it wasn't meant to be (stupid family expecting to spend time together over the holidays - what a bunch of.. err nm).  I've heard great things about archies setups as well, sure looks like a great cabin.  Thanks for sharing.

Archie is well known in the area for his Sugar Shack rentals. I've not heard of one complaint yet. And you can bet that Archie placed them over very productive waters. His summer Salmon charters are top class as well. Glad you had fun Monty.
Nice report Monty looks like a great place to bunk and fish.
